title: Silver 3 looking for ADC to duo with
body: Hi everyone. I'm a silver 3 support main who is looking for a silver ADC to get to gold with. I don't want to voice chat, just play sometimes and have fun ranking up. I main Sion as support by the way :)

replies.body: Hi, S3 adc here, trying to get to gold and have a fun time on my way there. Feel free to add me.
